message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can negotiate further if you'd like.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To avoid further delays (and the corresponding drop in value on my end), I'm proposing that you receive $7000 and I receive $3000. I believe this offers us both a timely resolution and a fair division under the circumstances. I hope you'll agree to settle now rather than risk further losses for both of us.
